content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our relationship with Liberty Mutual began in April 2019 when Ark was introduced to a Liberty Mutual CIO through a mutual acquiantence.  We signed our initial contract in August 2019 for a project called Singularity – more to come on that later.  We ended 2019 with 4 projects and almost $1 million in revenue.  2020 was a year of significant growth and we ended the year with 24 projects, over 400 team members and $14 million in revenue – all within the GRS organization (commercial insurance BU).  2021 was another high growth year and we also began work with other organizations within Liberty – including our first projects with the personal insurance side of the org.  We ended the year with 33 projects, over 450 people and over $30 million in revenue.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":58332,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b580646a-cb69-45b0-8179-03b9344be4e4/NEW 4.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b580646a-cb69-45b0-8179-03b9344be4e4/NEW 4.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"NEW 4.PNG\",\"name\":\"NEW 4.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"b580646a-cb69-45b0-8179-03b9344be4e4\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":346.87699468085106},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{\"size\":31364,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c66db5ba-bd5e-441f-b707-e55ba645aa72/Captureioiiii.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c66db5ba-bd5e-441f-b707-e55ba645aa72/Captureioiiii.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Captureioiiii.PNG\",\"name\":\"Captureioiiii.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"c66db5ba-bd5e-441f-b707-e55ba645aa72\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":680,\"height\":619.0000000000001},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\nEarly into our relationship, an Executive Leadership team was created to lead the account in it’s growth and delivery.  The team is called “four in the box” and includes Carl Lefkowitz as the Principal Account Director, Denis Bolgov as the Delivery Director over Execution, Josh Aronowitz as the Sales Director for Entry & Expansion, and Brian Amara as the Insurance Consulting Lead driving value & solution shaping.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{\"size\":31364,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c66db5ba-bd5e-441f-b707-e55ba645aa72/Captureioiiii.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c66db5ba-bd5e-441f-b707-e55ba645aa72/Captureioiiii.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Captureioiiii.PNG\",\"name\":\"Captureioiiii.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"c66db5ba-bd5e-441f-b707-e55ba645aa72\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":680,\"height\":619.0000000000001},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rIn addition, we have an European team that models this structure – including Matt Bury and Ben Morgan.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":143326,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/119631e6-1223-45c1-b21a-390aa7d72003/Captuoooore.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/119631e6-1223-45c1-b21a-390aa7d72003/Captuoooore.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Captuoooore.PNG\",\"name\":\"Captuoooore.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"119631e6-1223-45c1-b21a-390aa7d72003\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029.0103759765625,\"height\":598.0366185087316},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{\"size\":31364,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c66db5ba-bd5e-441f-b707-e55ba645aa72/Captureioiiii.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c66db5ba-bd5e-441f-b707-e55ba645aa72/Captureioiiii.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Captureioiiii.PNG\",\"name\":\"Captureioiiii.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"c66db5ba-bd5e-441f-b707-e55ba645aa72\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":680,\"height\":619.0000000000001},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\\r\\n\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
